articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
articles.title: Redmi 9A May Just Have Received 3C Certification With 10W Charging - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Redmi 9A, a watered-down version of the Redmi 9 and the successor to the Redmi 8A, appears to have received a certification from the Compulsory Certification of China (3C) with a model number M2006C3LC.
articles.content: Redmi 9A, a watered-down version of the Redmi 9 and the successor to the Redmi 8A, may debut in the coming days. While Xiaomi is yet to provide an official confirmation, a listing on the database of … [+2006 chars]

articles.description: Microsoft Defender ATP for Android will proactively scan malicious applications, files, and potentially unwanted applications that users may download to their mobile devices.

articles.title: Xiaomi Mi 9T Pro MIUI 12 update delayed for Europe due to some issues - PiunikaWeb
articles.description: As per a comment by Xiaomi moderator, the MIUI 12 stable update for Mi 9T Pro in Europe will be delayed due to some issues and bugs.
articles.content:
